```{julia}
#| warning: false
using HmtArchive, HmtArchive.Analysis
using CitableText
current = hmt_cex()
normedtexts = hmt_normalized(current)
dse = hmt_dse(current)[1]

bookreport = HmtArchive.Analysis.missingbybook(normedtexts, dse)
vareport = filter(bookreport) do r
    versionid(r.book) == "msA" && groupid(r.book) == "tlg0012"
end
```
